attributes.action: pass legislation to ban the public sale of aerosol paint spray cans in order to help reduce graffiti.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The amount of graffiti in our streets and on public transport infrastructure continues to grow daily. It would make it much more difficult for vandals to desecrate our environment if aerosol paint spray cans were not available to the public.
